mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Horace P.Smith
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Horace P.Smith C. M. Stigleman, Guardian B. P. Elliott, Clerk of Floyd County Court, Assigned guardian ad Litem for Horace P. Smith in the matter of C. M. Stigleman vs. Horace P. Smith Recorded in Ledger Book 2, page 106, in Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
